description:
Expected claims (against other debtors)

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
52411 Statistics on filed insolvency proceedings

Definition:
The expected claims are determined by the local courts at
the time the judicial decision on the request for the
opening of insolvency proceedings is taken, and the data are
reported for compiling the above statistics. The sum also
includes claims secured by rights to separate satisfaction.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Expected claims (against other debtors)
